summary: Forge Recipes. Convert Daedric or Glass armor into a variety of Clothes and Robes with armor stats. Requires Daedric/Glass Smithing Perk.
descriptionHtml:
Work is on hold while I learn the scripting language for a bigger mod.

Forge Recipes. Convert Daedric or Glass armor into a variety of Clothes and Robes with armor stats. Requires Daedric/Glass Smithing Perk.

In the words of Sheogorath, \"Armor that looks like clothes!?  That\'s MADNESS!  Can you make it match the color of my eyes?\"

Working on adding more.

Tavern Clothes
Nocturnal Robe
Executioner Robes
Mourner Robes
Psiijic Robe (gloves, boots, hood)
Gloves
Spiked Gloves (Forsworn)
Farmer Hood
Execution Hood Dark and Light
Executioner Robe and Hood
Mourner Hood
Nocturnal Hood
Circlet (Gold and Emerald pattern)
Shoes

Just copy the .esp to your Data folder.
author: Ripvanwinkle111
